Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Apply fungicides containing captan or myclobutanil. Remove infected leaves and destroy them. Prune trees to improve air circulation.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Apply preventive fungicides in early spring. Remove fallen leaves and fruit.

Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Remove and destroy infected fruit, leaves, and branches. Apply fungicides during growing season. Prune dead and diseased wood.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Maintain tree vigor through proper fertilization. Remove mummified fruit. Apply dormant oil sprays.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.treatment: Apply fungicides when symptoms first appear. Remove nearby cedar trees if possible. Multiple applications may be needed.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Plant resistant apple varieties. Remove cedar trees within 2 miles. Apply preventive fungicides in spring.

Apple___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Apple___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices. Regular pruning and fertilization. Monitor for early signs of disease.

Blueberry___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Blueberry___healthy.prevention: Maintain proper soil pH (4.5-5.5). Ensure good drainage. Mulch to retain moisture.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply fungicides at first sign of disease. Prune infected shoots. Improve air circulation.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant in full sun. Space plants properly. Apply preventive fungicides in spring.

Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy.prevention: Regular pruning for air circulation. Proper irrigation. Monitor for pests and diseases.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.treatment: Apply foliar fungicides when disease first appears. Remove crop debris after harvest.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids. Rotate crops. Avoid overhead irrigation. Till crop residue.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.treatment: Apply fungicides if disease appears before tasseling. Scout fields regularly.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids. Time planting to avoid high-risk periods. Good field drainage.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides at first sign. Multiple applications may be needed. Remove infected plant debris.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids. Crop rotation with non-host crops. Till residue to reduce inoculum.

Corn_(maize)___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Corn_(maize)___healthy.prevention: Maintain proper plant spacing. Balanced fertilization. Regular field monitoring.

Grape___Black_rot.treatment: Remove and destroy infected fruit and leaves. Apply fungicides from bud break through harvest.
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Prune for air circulation. Remove mummified fruit. Apply dormant sprays.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).treatment: Remove and destroy infected vines. No effective chemical control. Prevent wound infections.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Protect pruning wounds. Avoid stress to vines. Delay pruning until late winter.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.treatment: Apply fungicides when symptoms first appear. Remove infected leaves. Improve air circulation.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Proper canopy management. Avoid overhead irrigation. Plant resistant varieties.

Grape___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Grape___healthy.prevention: Proper pruning and training. Balanced fertilization. Regular monitoring.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).treatment: No cure available. Remove infected trees immediately. Control psyllid vectors with insecticides.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).prevention: Plant certified disease-free nursery stock. Control Asian citrus psyllid. Regular inspection.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides. Remove severely infected leaves and branches. No complete cure.
Peach___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Avoid overhead irrigation. Prune for air circulation.

Peach___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Peach___healthy.prevention: Proper pruning. Balanced fertilization. Regular pest and disease monitoring.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Remove and destroy infected plants. Apply copper-based bactericides. Use drip irrigation.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds and transplants. Rotate crops. Avoid working in wet foliage.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Pepper,_bell___healthy.prevention: Proper spacing for air circulation. Consistent watering. Balanced fertilization.

Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides when first symptoms appear. Remove infected lower leaves. Maintain good air circulation.
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Rotate crops. Use certified seed. Avoid overhead irrigation. Apply mulch.

Potato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides immediately. Remove and destroy infected plants. Harvest before symptoms spread.
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Use certified seed. Apply preventive fungicides. Monitor weather.

Potato___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Potato___healthy.prevention: Proper hilling. Consistent irrigation. Use certified seed potatoes.

Raspberry___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Raspberry___healthy.prevention: Prune out old canes after harvest. Maintain good air circulation. Proper irrigation.

Soybean___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Soybean___healthy.prevention: Crop rotation. Use quality seed. Maintain proper plant density.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply fungicides at first sign. Remove heavily infected leaves. Improve air circulation.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Proper spacing. Avoid overhead watering. Full sun exposure.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.treatment: Remove and destroy infected leaves. Apply fungicides. Improve air circulation.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.prevention: Use disease-free plants. Proper spacing. Mulch to prevent soil splash. Drip irrigation.

Strawberry___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Strawberry___healthy.prevention: Remove old leaves in spring. Proper fertilization. Renew beds every 3-4 years.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides. Remove infected plants. Use drip irrigation only.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use certified disease-free seeds. Crop rotation. Avoid overhead watering. Stake plants.

Tomato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides when first spots appear. Remove lower infected leaves. Mulch soil.
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Crop rotation. Stake plants. Avoid overhead irrigation. Use disease-resistant varieties.

Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides immediately. Remove and destroy infected plants. Act quickly to prevent spread.
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Proper spacing. Apply preventive fungicides. Monitor weather forecasts.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.treatment: Improve air circulation. Reduce humidity. Apply fungicides. Remove infected leaves.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Proper spacing. Greenhouse ventilation. Avoid overhead watering.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.treatment: Apply fungicides at first sign. Remove lower infected leaves. Mulch to prevent splash.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Crop rotation. Remove plant debris. Stake plants. Avoid overhead watering.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.treatment: Spray with water to dislodge mites. Apply miticides. Introduce predatory mites.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Monitor regularly. Maintain plant vigor. Avoid water stress. Use reflective mulches.

Tomato___Target_Spot.treatment: Apply fungicides when symptoms first appear. Remove infected leaves. Improve air circulation.
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Crop rotation. Proper spacing. Avoid overhead irrigation. Use disease-free transplants.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.treatment: No cure available. Remove and destroy infected plants immediately. Disinfect tools.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Wash hands after smoking. Disinfect tools. Control aphids.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: No cure. Remove infected plants. Control whiteflies aggressively with insecticides.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Control whitefly vectors. Use reflective mulches. Physical barriers.

Tomato___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular maintenance.
Tomato___healthy.prevention: Proper spacing. Consistent watering. Balanced fertilization. Regular monitoring.
